Reference

All functions

abundance_palette()

eBird Status and Trends color palettes for abundance data

bernoulli_dev()

Bernoulli deviance

calc_bins()

Calculates bins (breaks) based on standard deviations of Box-Cox power-transformed data for mapping

calc_effective_extent()

Calculate and map effective extent of selected centroids

calc_full_extent()

Calculates spatial extent of non-zero data from Raster* object for plotting

compute_ppms()

Computes the Predictive Performance Metrics for a spatiotemporal extent

ebirdst

ebirdst: Tools to Load, Map, Plot, and Analyze eBird Status and Trends Data Products

ebirdst_download()

Download eBird Status and Trends Data

ebirdst_extent()

Construct a spatiotemporal extent object to subset Status and Trends data

ebirdst_predictors

eBird Status and Trends predictors

ebirdst_runs

Data frame of available eBird Status and Trends species

sample_grid() sample_case_control()

Spatial grid sampling methods

ebirdst_subset()

Subset eBird Status and Trends data spatiotemporally

get_species_path()

Get the data package path for a given species

label_raster_stack()

Labels 52 week RasterStack with the dates for each band

load_fac_map_parameters()

Load full annual cycle map parameters

load_pis()

Load predictor importances for single species eBird Status and Trends products

load_raster()

Load eBird Status and Trends raster data

load_test_preds()

Test data predictions loader

map_centroids()

Map PI centroid locations

parse_raster_dates()

Parses the names attached to a Raster from label_raster_stack()

plot_all_ppms()

Plot all predictive performance metrics

plot_binary_by_time()

Plot binary occurrence metrics by time

plot_pis()

Plot predictor importances boxplot

poisson_dev()

Poisson deviance

project_extent()

Transform a spatiotemporal extent to a different CRS

stixelize()

Generate stixel polygons from PI data
